name: entropy (itch) (Composerkiwi, Corvus Prudens, Ben Lipkin, Ray Demers, caiojmini, Trey Rodman)
name_original: entropy (itch) (Composerkiwi, Corvus Prudens, Ben Lipkin, Ray Demers, caiojmini, Trey Rodman)
description:
entropy is a simple, physics-based game about a lost planet.  Use the power of gravity to propel yourself through star systems as you avoid obstacles, meet friends, and discover what happened in your dying universe.

This game was created for THE Video Game Jam, hosted by Berklee's Video Game Music Club. 

Controls: 

WASD - move

R - restart/return to checkpoint
